short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the ordering of the address drop down on dominos.co.uk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It has always been a frustration of mine that the address ordering on dominos.co.uk was ordered by string meaning that the number of the address was not properly taken into account. Literally all this extension does is fix the address ordering. It has been years and it is still ordered incorrectly. There must be others out there who find this annoying so this fixes it and your OCD along with mine can finally rest easy.
